type.label: Type
type.description: Structural designation for the entry (Asset, Platform, or Wrapper)

category.label: Category
category.description: High level economic bucket describing the type of RWA or financial product represented

values.Fiat-Backed Stablecoins: Stablecoins designed to track a fiat currency, backed mainly by cash, deposits, and short-dated government securities.
values.Stablecoins backed by RWAs: Fiat-pegged stablecoins whose primary backing is RWAs, commonly tokenized Treasuries, credit instruments, or other yield-bearing RWAs.
values.Non-RWA Stablecoins: Stablecoins targeting a peg using onchain collateral or mechanisms, rather than direct backing by real-world assets.
values.Tokenized Funds (T-Bills, Bonds, MMFs): Tokenized shares or units of investment funds, including money market funds (MMFs), Treasury (T-bill/bond) funds, and similar cash-like vehicles.
values.Governance & Protocol Tokens: Tokens used to govern RWA-related protocols. They do not represent direct claims on RWAs.
values.Tokenized Gold & Commodities: Tokens representing commodity exposure, including gold, other precious metals, energy, industrial metals, and related baskets.
values.RWA Yield / Wrapper: Yield-bearing wrappers, vaults, and strategy tokens whose underlying is primarily RWAs (or RWA-backed stablecoins), packaging exposure or yield into a single onchain token.
values.Tokenized Stocks & Equities: Tokens representing exposure to publicly traded equities, ETFs, and other listed securities.
values.RWA Lending / Private Credit: Tokens representing loans, receivables, invoices, and other private credit instruments backed by off-chain cashflows.
values.Other / Exotic RWAs: Tokens representing alternative or niche real-world assets that do not fit other categories, such as collectibles and royalties.
values.Tokenized Crypto Funds: Tokenized shares or units of funds that hold crypto assets or crypto-linked strategies (e.g. index funds, diversified portfolios, or managed strategies).
values.Tokenized Real Estate: Tokens representing real estate interests, fractional ownership, or revenue participation linked to property assets.
values.Carbon Credits & Environmental Assets: Tokenized carbon credits and other environmental assets, including avoidance and removal instruments.

assetClass.label: Asset Class
assetClass.description: Granular economic type within a Category describing how the exposure is structured

values.USD fiat stablecoin: Stablecoins pegged to USD and backed mainly by cash, bank deposits and short-term government paper held by a centralized issuer or custodian.
values.EUR fiat stablecoin: Stablecoins pegged to EUR and backed mainly by euro cash, bank deposits and short-term government paper.
values.Other fiat stablecoin: Stablecoins pegged to non-USD, non-EUR fiat currencies such as GBP, CHF, SGD or baskets of fiat.
values.Bank deposit token: Tokens that represent a direct, redeemable claim on a bank or central bank deposit account at par value.
values.Yield-bearing fiat stablecoin: Fiat-pegged stablecoins that pass through some or all of the yield on reserve assets directly to token holders.
values.RWA-backed fiat stablecoin (non-yielding: Fiat-pegged stablecoins whose reserves are primarily real-world assets such as Treasury bills, bonds or commodity holdings (e.g. gold), but where yield is retained by the issuer rather than paid directly to token holders.
values.Yield-bearing RWA stablecoin: Fiat-pegged stablecoins whose reserves are real-world asset portfolios and where yield is paid directly to token holders via an increasing balance or rebase.
values.Hybrid / multi-asset RWA stablecoin: Stablecoins backed by a mix of real-world assets and onchain collateral, where neither side is clearly dominant.
values.Crypto-collateralized stablecoin (non-RW: Stablecoins backed primarily by onchain crypto collateral (e.g. ETH, stETH, LP tokens) with no material allocation to real-world assets.
values.Algorithmic / undercollateralized stable: Stablecoins that rely mainly on algorithmic mechanisms or undercollateralized backing rather than fully reserved collateral.
values.Tokenized T-bills: Tokens that give direct or near-direct exposure to short-term government Treasury bills or ETFs that hold them.
values.Sovereign bond fund: Tokenized vehicles that hold government notes and bonds with longer duration than T-bills.
values.Credit / corporate bond fund: Tokenized funds that hold corporate bonds, securitized credit or similar corporate fixed-income instruments.
values.Money market fund: Tokenized shares in a money market fund that holds short-duration, high-quality money market instruments.
values.Mixed RWA fund: Tokenized funds that hold a planned mix of sovereign debt, credit and cash-like assets where no single type dominates.
values.Allocated gold token: Gold tokens backed by specifically allocated bars or bar serial numbers held in custody for token holders.
values.Unallocated gold token: Gold tokens backed by a pooled, unallocated claim on gold held by a custodian.
values.Silver token: Tokens backed primarily by physical silver held in secure custody.
values.Platinum token: Tokens backed primarily by physical platinum.
values.Palladium token: Tokens backed primarily by physical palladium.
values.Uranium token: Tokens backed primarily by uranium or uranium inventory.
values.Other metal token: Tokens backed by a metal that is not gold, silver, platinum, palladium or uranium.
values.Commodity basket token: Tokens backed by a basket of commodities rather than a single underlying asset.
values.Other commodity token: Tokens backed primarily by a single physical commodity that is not a precious metal or uranium, such as crude oil, natural gas or agricultural products.
values.Single property equity token: Tokens that give equity-style exposure to a single property or real estate project.
values.Real estate fund / REIT token: Tokens that mirror units in a pooled real estate fund or REIT structure.
values.Real estate revenue share: Tokens whose primary claim is to a share of rental income or other property revenue streams.
values.Real estate credit note: Tokens backed primarily by loans to real estate projects or mortgages secured on property.
values.Real estate index / basket token: Tokens that track an index or diversified basket of real estate exposures, such as city-level home price indices or composite property portfolios, rather than single properties or REIT units.
values.Single stock synthetic: Tokens that track a single listed equity using synthetic replication rather than full custody of shares.
values.Single stock fully backed: Tokens backed by held underlying shares in custody that map 1:1 to a single listed equity.
values.Equity index / basket token: Tokens that track a basket or index of equities or equity ETFs.
values.Private equity / venture token: Tokens that represent interests in private company equity, venture capital funds or similar vehicles.
values.Artwork / collectibles token: Tokens backed by art, collectibles or other non-financial real assets such as luxury goods.
values.IP / royalty token: Tokens whose primary claim is to intellectual property or revenue/royalties from IP such as music, patents or media catalogs.
values.Other exotic RWA: Tokens backed by niche real-world assets that do not fit other categories, such as AI hardware, fleet assets or other specialized equipment.
values.Private credit pool: Pools backed by diversified private loans such as SME, corporate or consumer credit exposures.
values.Trade finance / invoice pool: Pools backed by invoices, receivables or other trade-finance assets.
values.Real estate credit: Credit exposures where the primary collateral is real estate or land.
values.Specialty / structured credit: Credit backed by niche or structured assets such as revenue-based finance, litigation finance, project finance or asset-backed fleet financing.
values.Other private credit: Private credit pools that are clearly real world lending exposures but do not fit the more specific labels.
values.Reinsurance backed RWA pool: Pools where the primary risk and return come from reinsurance or insurance underwriting exposure.
values.RWA lending market / venue: Protocols or markets that primarily facilitate issuance, trading or lending against RWA collateral or private credit pools, rather than representing a single pool token.
values.Stablecoin yield wrapper: Wrappers whose underlying is one or more stablecoins and that issue a yield-bearing receipt token.
values.Single asset RWA wrapper: Wrappers that mainly hold one underlying RWA token or fund and issue a single receipt token.
values.RWA index / basket vault: Wrappers that hold a basket of RWA tokens or funds and present them as one composite position or index-like exposure.
values.RWA LP wrapper: Tokens that represent LP positions where the majority of exposure is to RWA tokens or RWA stablecoins.
values.Leveraged RWA vault: Wrappers that apply leverage or active rebalancing on top of RWA collateral to modify yield or duration.
values.Structured RWA note: Tokens that embed structured payouts or note-like features on top of underlying RWA collateral.
values.Yield bearing RWA pool: Tokens that directly represent a yield-generating RWA pool that is not positioned as a stablecoin.
values.Carbon offset credit: Tokens that represent carbon offsets from specific projects that can be retired against voluntary carbon goals.
values.Carbon allowance: Tokens that represent allowances from regulated cap-and-trade schemes or compliance carbon markets.
values.Carbon-backed reserve asset: Tokens that function as reserve or treasury assets and are backed by baskets of carbon credits or similar environmental units, rather than representing individual retireable offset claims.
values.Other environmental unit: Tokens linked to other environmental or impact units such as renewable energy certificates or biodiversity credits.
values.Governance / voting token (RWA protocol): Tokens that confer governance rights, voting power or protocol control over an RWA platform or product suite, without being a direct 1:1 claim on the underlying assets.
values.Revenue / fee share token (RWA protocol): Tokens that entitle holders to a share of protocol revenues or fees from an RWA platform while not being a direct claim on underlying asset pools.
values.Synthetic backed stablecoin: Stablecoins backed by synthetic crypto or derivatives strategies (such as delta-neutral basis trades or perp hedging) rather than direct fiat or real-world asset reserves.

onChainMcap.label: Onchain Marketcap
onChainMcap.description: Total USD value of the asset that exists on chain across tracked chains

activeMcap.label: Active Marketcap
activeMcap.description: Portion of on chain TVL taking real market risk in user or protocol hands

defiActiveTvl.label: DeFi Active TVL
defiActiveTvl.description: Subset of Active TVL deployed in third party DeFi protocols tracked by DeFiLlama

totalOnChainMcap.label: Total RWA Onchain
totalOnChainMcap.description: Sum across assets of their Onchain Marketcap (the total USD value of each asset that exists Onchain across tracked chains).

totalActiveMcap.label: Total RWA Active Marketcap
totalActiveMcap.description: Sum across assets of their Active Marketcap (the portion of Onchain value taking real market risk in user or protocol hands).

totalDefiActiveTvl.label: DeFi Active TVL
totalDefiActiveTvl.description: Sum across assets of their DeFi Active TVL (the subset of Active TVL deployed in tracked third-party DeFi protocols).

rwaClassification.label: RWA Classification
rwaClassification.description: High level classification describing the economic nature of the entry

values.True RWA: Tokenized real-world asset that is transferable and self-custodial, with both documented redemption and reserve or asset verification
values.RWA: Tokenized real-world asset that is transferable and self-custodial, with either documented redemption or reserve or asset verification
values.Programmable Finance: RWA-linked onchain products like wrappers, strategy/pool tokens, synthetics, or restricted fund tokens that aren't transferable or self-custodial
values.Non-RWA (Platform): Platform or infrastructure item related to RWAs, not an asset token or RWA exposure instrument
values.Non-RWA (Gov/Utility): Governance or utility token that is not a tokenized real-world asset or RWA exposure instrument

accessModel.label: Access Model
accessModel.description: Indicates how users interact with the asset

values.Permissioned: Requires KYC/AML verification to hold or transfer the asset
values.Permissionless: Open to any wallet address without identity verification
values.Non-transferable: Locked to the original wallet; cannot be transferred to other addresses
values.Custodial Only: Must be held through an authorized custodian; no self-custody option
values.Unknown: Access requirements have not been disclosed

issuer.label: Issuer
issuer.description: Legal entity or organization responsible for issuing or controlling the asset

isin.label: ISIN
isin.description: International Securities Identification Number - a 12-character alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies a specific security

registryInformation.label: Registry Information
registryInformation.description: Identifiers or registry data for the issuer from corporate or regulatory databases

source.label: Source
source.description: Primary public reference confirming issuer information

primaryChain.label: Primary Chain
primaryChain.description: Single chain slug representing the chain where the asset or platform is primarily issued or anchored

redeemable.label: Redeemable
redeemable.description: Indicates whether the token can be redeemed for underlying assets

attestations.label: Attestations
attestations.description: Indicates whether the issuer provides periodic attestations or assurance reports regarding reserves or backing

cexListed.label: CEX Listed
cexListed.description: Indicates whether the token is listed on a centralized exchange

kycForMintRedeem.label: KYC to Mint or Redeem
kycForMintRedeem.description: Indicates whether minting or redeeming the token through the issuer or primary market requires KYC/AML verification (KYC/KYB/onboarding)

kycAllowlistedWhitelistedToTransferHold.label: KYC/Allowlisted/Whitelisted to Transfer/Hold
kycAllowlistedWhitelistedToTransferHold.description: Indicates whether holding or transferring the token requires prior verification or allowlisting/whitelisting (issuer or transfer-agent permissioning), enforced at the token, contract, or venue level

transferable.label: Transferable
transferable.description: Indicates whether the token can be transferred freely between on chain addresses

selfCustody.label: Self Custody
selfCustody.description: Indicates whether the token can be held in a user controlled wallet

totalAssetIssuers.label: Total Asset Issuers
totalAssetIssuers.description: Total number of unique issuers across all tracked real world assets in the current selection

totalAssetCount.label: Total Asset Count
totalAssetCount.description: Total number of real world assets in the current selection

totalStablecoinsMcap.label: Total Stablecoins Marketcap
totalStablecoinsMcap.description: Total USD value of all stablecoins in the dataset that exist on chain across tracked chains in the current selection
